## Find the following properties in the below html: 
- a hyperlink anchor
- bullet points
- italics
- the two bits of code that brings the user back to the top
- a comment


```html
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>Mini Site — Structured</title>
</head>
<body>
  <a id="top"></a>

  <header>
    <h1>My Mini Site</h1>
    <nav>
      <a href="#about">About</a>
      <a href="#links">Links</a>
      <a href="#image">Image</a>
    </nav>
  </header>

  <main>
    <section id="about">
      <h2>About</h2>
      <p>Hello! This is a <em>paragraph</em>.</p>
    </section>

    <section id="links">
      <h2>Links</h2>
      <p>
        Visit <a href="https://example.com">Example</a>.
        (Try adding <code>target="_blank"</code> yourself to open in a new tab.)
      </p>
    </section>

    <section id="image">
      <h2>Image</h2>
      <p>
        <img src="https://picsum.photos/200/120" alt="A random placeholder image">
      </p>
    </section>

    <section id="todo">
      <h2>My To-Do List</h2>
      <ul>
        <li>Write a paragraph</li>
        <li>Add one link</li>
        <li>Insert an image with a good <code>alt</code> description</li>
      </ul>
    </section>
  </main>

<!-- wut? -->
  <footer>
    © 2025 Your Name · <a href="#top">Back to top</a>
  </footer>
</body>
</html>
```
